revision.comment: /* top */ clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Seagate BlackArmor NAS 220.jpg |image1_size = 100px |caption = BlackArmor NAS 220 |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = http://www.seagate.com/support/external-hard-drives/network-storage/blackarmor-nas-220/ |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Seagate_BlackArmor_NAS_220 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Seagate |model = BlackArmor NAS |submodelappend = yes |submodel = 220 |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 10/26/2018 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Seagate_BlackArmor_NAS_220 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = NAS |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88F6192; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARMv5 |cpu1_type_rev = Feroceon core |cpu1spd = 800 <!-- 600 / 800 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;K9F5608U0D-PCB0; |flash1size = 32 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5PS1G63EFR-S6C; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1116R; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:10:75
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.4;Marvell 3.4.4; |stockos = Linux;2.6.22.18;KW LSP 4.2.7;
|exp_if_types = SATA II, USB 2.0, |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_sata_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = barrel (EIAJ-03) |pwr_barrel_outer = 4.75 |pwr_barrel_inner = 1.7 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery backup, |addchip = 4-port USB Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL850G;;1;,,, Temperature Sensor Hub and Fan Controller;Analog Devices;ADT7470;;1;,,, N&P Channel MOSFET;Niko Semi;P2503NVG;;2;,,, 3A Low Dropout Positive Adjustable Regulator;ANPEC;APL1085;;1; Dual D-type positive-edge-triggered flip-flop;Texas Instruments;SN74AHC74;;1;,,, Dual PWM Step Down Controller w/ Low Power LDO, RTC Regulator;Maxim;MAX17020;;1;,,, P-Channel Field Effect Transistor;Alpha&Omega Semiconductor;AO4433;;1;,,, 30V N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha&Omega Semiconductor;AO4468;;2;,,, 30V N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha&Omega Semiconductor;AO4712;;2;,,, 3A Ultra Low Dropout Linear Regulator;ANPEC;APL5930;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Debian, OpenWrt,
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 07/2009 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = N82E16822148485 |asin = B002HKCVVW |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "08172-1", "2D Lassen M/B" and "48.61W01.011" are silkscreened on the board.
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/nas/nas-reviews/30884-seagate-blackarmor-nas-220-reviewed Seagate BlackArmor NAS 220 Reviewed on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[https://www.pcmag.com/article2/0,2817,2351767,00.asp Seagate BlackArmor NAS 220 on '''PC Mag'''] *[https://www.cnet.com/reviews/seagate-blackarmor-nas-220-nas-server-review/ Seagate BlackArmor NAS 220 NAS server on '''c|net'''] *[https://www.wired.com/2009/11/pr-seagate-ba-nas220-server/ Seagate BlackArmor NAS 220 Server on '''Wired''']
